headline: Workday Completes Paradox Acquisition, Unveils End-to-End AI Hiring Suite
summary: Workday Inc. (NASDAQ:WDAY) is one of the best American stocks to buy and hold for the next 3 years. On October 1, Workday announced the completion of its acquisition of Paradox. Paradox is a candidate experience agent that uses conversational AI to streamline the job application process, with a particular focus on high-volume hiring in frontline […]
